name: Agent Rogue
description: Agent Rogue is the first-ever AI podcaster agent. It can generate infinite voice content featuring AI versions of celebrities (both crypto and non-crypto). It holds podcasts with other AI guests such as AI versions of celebrities like Trump, Elon, SBF, Tate etc. Furthermore Agent Rogue aims to be the framework for voice-powered AI agents. It is laying the groundwork for an entire ecosystem of voice-based AI tools.
